a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population living in extreme poverty, World, 1820 to
This data is calculated based on a ‘cost of basic needs’ approach. It represents the share of the population unable to meet basic
needs (including minimal nutrition and adequately heated shelter) according to prices of locally-available goods and services at the
